title: Introducing: Rebecca Clements
body:
Nineteen year old London **Rebecca Clements** has a beguiling sincerity to her voice that is found in so few modern day singer songwriters.

_Wildlife_ is simultaneously devastating and uplifting, without stripping back the elements that keep her sound entirely unique. Check it out below.
